short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to upload large files in chunks, And get preset prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online communication with ChatGPT Assistant! Easily upload large files in manageable chunks, ensuring smooth transfers. It also provides preset prompts to stimulate engaging discussions.

WARNING
Be carful when uploading files that are 5+ prompts as it ChatGPT has short memory.

Works better with GPT-4
